title: Blood Pond
description: This edition is no longer available.Ten years ago, August's adolescent brother was brutally murdered, and dumped in Blood Pond. The one person he is sure can identify the killer is on the run.Bruce can't escape the horror of what he experienced the night his friend, Tommy, was slaughtered in front of his eyes. Although he survived, he is still on the run, running from shadows that he can't see. The last thing he wants is to come face to face with his greatest nightmare, face to face with the older brother of his dead boyhood crush.The person chasing Bruce is a face he once admired in a photograph, a man desperately seeking closure to his brother's murder. August has given up everything to find Bruce because he is sure that Bruce is the key to helping him find what he seeks.But can Bruce help August find the killer, or will the answer be buried forever at the bottom of Blood Pond?
author: D.J. Manly
